name: Cannon Bubble
overview: Prove that you are the best buccaneer in the South Seas ... and fight for your life against the fearsome pirate Blackbeard. You are an apprentice pirate, who has to prove his worth as a cannonman to earn the respect of your captain. You can practice against a King's soldier, and then you must face the challenge of overcoming the 30 levels that separate you from the defeat of Blackbeard.
